summary: Test server downloads are rate-limited when fetching directly from GitHub. The solution is to serve test server binaries through a CDN to avoid GitHub's rate limiting.
userImpact: Users running tests with the testing package encounter rate limit errors when downloading the test server binary from GitHub.
rootCause: Direct downloads from GitHub API hit rate limits under repeated or concurrent access patterns.
proposedFix: Implement CDN-based distribution for test server binaries instead of direct GitHub downloads.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved by moving test server distribution behind a CDN to handle rate limiting.
keyQuote: Users using testing package may get: `HTTPError: Response code 403 (rate limit exceeded)` from: `node ./scripts/download-test-server.mjs`
